scripts.ci:build-frontend: wait-on http://127.0.0.1:1337 && cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && npm run ci:stop-backend
scripts.ci:prep: cd backend && npm run strapi export -- --no-encrypt --file strapi-export-ci
scripts.ci:start-backend: cd backend && npm run start & echo $! > backend.pid
scripts.dev:frontend: wait-on http://127.0.0.1:1337 && cd frontend && bun run dev
